job.title: Software Engineer-App Store Frameworks
job.description: Summary When this team introduced the App Store, it launched a cultural and economicphenomenon that changed the way people live, work, and play. Theseengineers continue to innovate the platform, now home to over 1.5 million appsâ each created using the teamâs own software development kit and relatedservices. All those apps mean the store takes billions of requests from morethan 500 million visitors every week, across iOS, macOS, tvOS, iPadOS, andwatchOS.To deliver such a rich experience at this scale, the engineers build highperformancesystems backed up by persistent systemwide A/B testing. And tohelp people discover apps they love, the team uses machine learningtechniques that include natural language processing to develop newalgorithms for personalization, search, and recommender systems. In a worldwhere apps have become essential in peopleâs daily lives, the App Store teamhas become essential to Appleâs business.Areas of work include macOS/iOS Engineering, Full-Stack Engineering, Front-EndEngineering, Back-End Engineering, Quality Engineering, Machine LearningEngineering, Data Science, Data Engineering, Site Reliability Engineering, CommerceEngineering, and Engineering Project Management.The App Store engineering team is looking for a motivated and dedicated engineer to join our team! Help build the next generation App Store and continually enhance our current store. The App Store team empowers developers to create successful global businesses and customers to discover the best apps. Be a part of a innovative team making a difference. Key Qualifications Strong programming fundamentals and experience with Objective-CStrong problem solving and critical thinking skillsYou have a passion for quality and attention to detailYou bring a depth of experience working with large code basesYou are passionate about reaching millions of users across our many platformsYou love collaborating under tight deadlines and tackling problems with imaginative and elegant solutions. Description The App Store Frameworks team works cross-functionally throughout Apple to develop reliable daemons, great APIs for app installation, In-App Purchases, and On Demand Resources. Help design and implement APIs used by Apple employees and developers around the world. We actively investigate production issues to resolve bugs and enhance performance with each iOS/tvOS/macOS release. Scalability is always a top concern due to the massive user-base of iOS/tvOS/macOS customers. Reliability is crucial, and weâre looking for engineers with a passion for architecting complex systems. Education & Experience Bachelors degree, or higher, in Computer Science or other relevant discipline Role Number: 200210069
